alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 06 at 2:41AM MDT until October 06 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures between 29 and 32 degrees will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 degrees expected. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Northern Sioux County. In Wyoming, Converse County Lower Elevations and Niobrara County Counties. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 8 AM MDT Friday. For the Freeze Warning, from midnight Friday night to 8 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
